title: `rustdoc` panics on unicode character inside code-block
body:
`rustdoc` panics on HORIZONTAL ELLIPSIS inside a code-block ...

``````
/// ```
/// All those things …
/// ```
``````

... while it accepts them otherwise :

```
///
/// All those things …
///
/// > All those things …
///
/// ### All those things …
///
/// `All those things …`
///
```

```
<stdin>:1:18: 1:19 error: unknown start of token: \u{2026}
<stdin>:1 All those things …
                           ^
thread '<unnamed>' panicked at 'Box<Any>', ../src/libsyntax\parse\lexer/mod.rs:167
